thread.section_title: AKA Central Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Above and Beyond my expectations!
thread.title_full: Above and Beyond my expectations! - Review of AKA Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ricky300m
title: Above and Beyond my expectations!
text:
This is one place, that when I return to New York, I will without fail come to. The staff at the front desk was friendly and accommodating. The room was spacious and clean. Plenty of closet space for all our stuff.
I was in touch with Alexa at this facility weeks prior to my arrival and she made me feel like there would be no problems with an early check in and late check due to our flight hours- being an IPrefer member this was taken care of for us.
Giovanni checked us in with no problem early in the AM and Alexa called us later that evening making sure we checked in without a problem and wishing my wife and I happy anniversary.
Thank you Alexa!
Thanks to AKA Central Park
